title: Wellbeing: Beat the Post Lunch Slump - Natural Health
author: Natural Health editorial team
description: Do you feel like a lump of lead for most of the afternoon? Don't worry - you're not alone. Here, wellbeing expert Gill Hasson gives her tips on making it through the day with energy and enthusiasm
